snippet.title: The Eldritch Monarch - Kickstarter trailer
snippet.description: Dive into an adventure with our new game for the Sega Mega Drive and Windows, with plans to expand to more platforms. Drawing inspiration from iconic cinematic platformers like the original Prince of Persia and Flashback, this game transports you to a Lovecraftian world enshrouded in ice. Amidst the chaos of insane cults and a despotic monarch, the Hollow Mountain stands as the sole beacon of warmth, harboring secrets critical to the survival of humanity. Keep an eye out for our Kickstarter campaign to help bring this mysterious and chilling tale to life! Link coming soon.
